summary: This code appends the parent directory to the system path, imports jinja_utils, retrieves code and template paths using the function from jinja_utils, and then loads, renders, and formats the template with specified parameters and banner.

details.comment: This code appends the parent directory to the system path, imports jinja_utils, retrieves code and template paths using the function from jinja_utils, and then loads, renders, and formats the template with specified parameters and banner.
details.content:
import sys
sys.path.append("../")
import jinja_utils
code_path, template_path = jinja_utils.code_and_template_path("test_model")
jinja_utils.load_render_and_format(
    template_path, code_path, render_params=dict(), banner="TEST MODEL CODE"
)
